text: Las Minas () may refer to: ==Populated places== * Las Minas District, Panama, or its capital also called Las Minas * the municipality of Las Minas, Veracruz, or its municipal seat of the same name ==Natural features== * Cerro Las Minas, the highest mountain in Honduras * Las Minas Creek, a river in Jalisco, Mexico * Río de la Mina, a river in Puerto Rico ==Archaeological sites== * Cerro de las Minas, a Mixtec site in Oaxaca, Mexico
title: Las Minas
